main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in San Fernando, California on January 7, 1964.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes., The report requests further information regarding past UFO sightings., The civilian planned to complete a PIO Form 142 for reporting unidentified flying objects., The document is part of Project Blue Book, investigating UFOs for the Air Force., An envelope related to the case is marked 'OFFICIAL BUSINESS' and dated February 18, 1965.
